MenuItem.name: Component Types and Pricing Levels
MenuItem.privilege: Configure Component Types and Pricing Levels

ExcelImport.name: Import Transaction cube
ExcelImport.title: Import Transaction cube
ExcelImport.prompt: Type the name of the Excel file you want to import or click the Browse button to select a file.

Dimension.name: PRICE_CHANGE_TARGET_ALL
Dimension.title: Price Change for All Trans to PG Target

Measure.name: PG_RAW_FLOOR_PERC
Measure.title: Z Do Not Use (Raw Floor Margin %)

Measure.name: PG_RAW_TARGET_PERC
Measure.title: Z Do Not Use (Raw Target Margin %)

Measure.name: PG_RAW_EXPERT_PERC
Measure.title: Z Do Not Use (Raw Expert Margin %)

Measure.name: REV_BELOW_FLOOR
Measure.title: NM-Rev Below Floor
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] < ([PG_FLOOR] * [SALES_VOLUME]) AND ([PG_FLOOR] * [SALES_VOLUME]) IS NOT NULL THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: REV_BTWN_FLOOR_TGT
Measure.title: NM-Rev Btwn Below Floor
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] > ([PG_FLOOR] * [SALES_VOLUME]) AND [SALES_REVENUE] < ([PG_TARGET] * [SALES_VOLUME]) AND [SALES_REVENUE] IS NOT NULL AND ([PG_TARGET] * [SALES_VOLUME]) IS NOT NULL THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: REV_BTWN_TGT_EXP
Measure.title: NM-Rev Btwn Tgt Exp
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] > ([PG_TARGET] * [SALES_VOLUME]) AND [SALES_REVENUE] < ([PG_EXPERT] * [SALES_VOLUME]) AND [SALES_REVENUE] IS NOT NULL AND ([PG_TARGET] * [SALES_VOLUME]) IS NOT NULL THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE NULL END}

Measure.name: REV_ABOVE_EXP
Measure.title: NM-Rev Above Exp
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] > ([PG_EXPERT] * [SALES_VOLUME]) AND ([PG_EXPERT] * [SALES_VOLUME]) IS NOT NULL THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE NULL END}
{CASE WHEN [PG_FLOOR] > [SALES_REVENUE] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_FLOOR] - [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: FLOOR_OPPORTUNITY
Measure.title: Floor Opp $

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] < [PG_FLOOR] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_FLOOR] - [SALES_REVENUE] WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] BETWEEN [PG_FLOOR] AND [PG_TARGET] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_TARGET] - [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: INCREMENTAL_TARGET_OPPORTUNITY
Measure.title: Incremental Target Opp

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [PG_TARGET] > [SALES_REVENUE] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_TARGET] - [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: TARGET_OPPORTUNITY
Measure.title: Target Opp $

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [PG_TARGET_ACHIEV] > [SALES_REVENUE] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_TARGET_ACHIEV] - [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: TARGET_ACHIEV_OPPORTUNITY
Measure.title: Achievable Opp $

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [PG_EXPERT] > [SALES_REVENUE] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_EXPERT] - [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: EXPERT_OPPORTUNITY
Measure.title: Expert Opp $

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] < [PG_FLOOR] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: REVENUE_BELOW_FLOOR
Measure.title: Rev Below Floor

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] >= [PG_FLOOR] AND [SALES_REVENUE] < [PG_TARGET] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: REVENUE_BTWN_FLOOR_TARGET
Measure.title: Rev Btwn Floor and Target

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] >= [PG_TARGET] AND [SALES_REVENUE] < [PG_EXPERT] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: REVENUE_BTWN_TARGET_EXPERT
Measure.title: Rev Btwn Target and Expert

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] >= [PG_EXPERT] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: REVENUE_ABOVE_EXPERT
Measure.title: Rev Above Expert

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [PG_FLOOR] > [SALES_REVENUE] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_FLOOR] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: FLOOR_OPPORTUNITY_HYPO
Measure.title: Floor Hypothetical

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [SALES_REVENUE] > [PG_FLOOR] AND [SALES_REVENUE] < [PG_TARGET] AND [SALES_REVENUE] > 0 THEN [PG_TARGET] ELSE 0 END}
Measure.name: TARGET_OPPORTUNITY_HYPO
Measure.title: Target Hypothetical

Measure.name: REV_OPP_LIFT_TARGET_ALL_PERC
Measure.title: % Rev Lift Opp at Target All

Measure.name: REV_OPP_LIFT_INC_PERC
Measure.title: % Rev Lift Opp at Incr Target

Measure.name: REV_OPP_LIFT_TARGET_ACHIEV_PERC
Measure.title: % Rev Lift Opp at Achievable Target

Measure.name: IMP_REV_FLOOR_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev at Price Change to Floor

Measure.name: IMP_REV_TARGET_ALL_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev at Price Change to Target All

Measure.name: IMP_REV_INC_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev at Price Change Incr Target

Measure.name: IMP_REV_TARGET_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev at Price Change to Target

Measure.name: IMP_REV_TARGET_ACHIEV_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev at Price Change to Achievable Target

Measure.name: CNT_TRANS_BELOW_MIN
Measure.title: PG Trans Below Min
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [PG_EXPERT_PERC] < MIN([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) THEN 1 ELSE null END}

Measure.name: CNT_TRANS_P_BELOW_MIN
Measure.title: PG Trans Partially Below Min
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ([PG_EXPERT_PERC] >= MIN([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) ) AND ([PG_FLOOR_PERC] < MIN([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID])) THEN 1 ELSE null END}

Measure.name: CNT_TRANS_IN_HIST_RANGE
Measure.title: PG Trans In Historical Range
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ([PG_EXPERT_PERC] <= MAX([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) ) AND ([PG_FLOOR_PERC] >= MIN([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID])) THEN 1 ELSE null END}

Measure.name: CNT_TRANS_P_ABOVE_MAX
Measure.title: PG Trans Partially Above Max
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ([PG_EXPERT_PERC] > MAX([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) ) AND ([PG_FLOOR_PERC] <= MAX([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID])) THEN 1 ELSE null END}

Measure.name: CNT_TRANS_ABOVE_MAX
Measure.title: PG Trans Above Max
Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [PG_FLOOR_PERC] > MAX([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) THEN 1 ELSE null END}
{CASE WHEN [PG_EXPERT_PERC] < MIN([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: IMP_REV_TRANS_BELOW_MIN
Measure.title: Impacted Rev PG Trans Below Min

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN ([PG_EXPERT_PERC] >= MIN([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) ) AND ([PG_FLOOR_PERC] <= MAX([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID])) THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: IMP_REV_TRANS_IN_HIST_RANGE
Measure.title: Impacted Rev PG Trans In Historical Range

Measure.formula: {CASE WHEN [PG_FLOOR_PERC] > MAX([MARGIN_PCT_PG]) OVER (PARTITION BY [PRODUCT_ID]) THEN [SALES_REVENUE] ELSE null END}
Measure.name: IMP_REV_TRANS_ABOVE_MAX
Measure.title: Impacted Rev PG Trans Above Max

Measure.name: CNT_TRANS_IN_HIST_RANGE_PERC
Measure.title: % Count PG Trans In Historical Range

Measure.name: IMP_REV_TRANS_BELOW_MIN_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev PG Trans Below Min

Measure.name: IMP_REV_TRANS_IN_HIST_RANGE_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev PG Trans In Historical Range

Measure.name: IMP_REV_TRANS_ABOVE_MAX_PERC
Measure.title: % Impacted Rev PG Trans Above Max
